history.narrative: Law 6-17 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 6-114, which was referred to the Committee on Libraries, Recreation, and Charitable Games. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 14, 1985 and May 28, 1985, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on June 10, 1985, it was assigned Act No. 6-32 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
